title: Staying Back at Walmart vs Joining Salesforce SMTS
content:
Education: B.Tech from Tier-2
Years of Experience: 6.2

**Current Company- Walmart Global Tech India
Title- Software Engineer III**
Location: Bangalore, India
Current CTC - 
Base Pay- 28.5 lakhs
Annual bonus- 20% of base- 5.44 lakhs
RSU- 25% of base- 6.8 lakhs(per year, vested quaterly)
**Total CTC- 40.77 LPA**
Have refreshers as well.

**Company: Salesforce**
**Title/Level: SMTS**
Org/Pillar- Service Cloud
Location: Bangalore, India
Salary:
Base- 53LPA
Annual Bonus-7.95 lakhs
Relocation/Joining: 0
Stock bonus: 74k$ (4 years)
Total CTC (Salary + Bonus + RSU):
**53 + 7.95L + 15.6L = 76.5 LPA**
Refresher-Have heard, its very rare, only for top performers.

Spoke with my manager and director about the offer, they want to retain me.
Ready to give a revised compensation with promotion to next level.
Title- Senior Software Engineer
Base- 40LPA
Bonus-20% -8 lakhs per year
RSU-25% 10 lakhs per year vested quarterly
**Total compensation- 58 LPA**
Have refreshers as well.
**Team is great, project is tier 1 project. Have good reputation, since I have delivered few important features.
Work can be hectic at times, have  rotational on call duties. But leaders are great.**
If I continue to work, can see a lot of growth opportunities in terms of learning.

Need some advice on this.
Shall I stay back? Or do I join Salesforce.
Salesforce project- no idea, have been trying to reach out to HR to schedule a meeting with the HM, its still pending.
How will be the work at Salesfoce, have not heard many positive reviews about the quality of the work.

**Priorities**
Work Quaity/learning opportunities > WLB > Compensation.
**At times I have this thought also**
WLB > Work Quaity/learning opportunities  > Compensation.

Please let me know.
